content: two pins on the round edge with the single crochets place a third pin into the top corner of the chain two the furthest corner from the white and blue stitches and pull it out to form a point the two wings should form a mirror image pictured right once the placement is correct spray with water and leave to dry if you cannot block the wings pin the wings in this shape when attaching the wings by sewing and/or gluing to the body feet chain 2 half_double_crochet & half_double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch into same stitch finishing feet position the feet so the back of the foot is at the centre of the bottom of the duck wrong side facing outwards sew or fabric glue the feet to the base i like to hide the threads inside the work and then put a small amount of glue in the centre of the foot wings sew or glue the wings i like to loosely knot the threads behind the wing and then pull the knots inside the duck with a yarn needle i then add a small amount of glue it also works to leave one thread in the starting colour long and sew the wing to the body make sure to catch threads from the underside of the wing instead of the outside stitches for a neat finish eyes make two french knots for eyes using black embroidery thread alternatively make a small stitch with black yarn end of pattern you may sell finished products handmade by you but you are not permitted to reproduce any part of this pattern tag me in your finished photos on instagram @_alexcrochets_
